page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: Houses near Calcott farm are very modern made with brick partly tile.All windows are casement.Majority of houses are semi's with some modern bungalows.Further into Pilgrims Hatch there are many styles of houses.The older 20th century houses are made of pebble dash or brick with casement windows.Most have slate or tile roofs. Here there is a mixture of detached,semi's and terraced.In Blenheim Rd. a new estate of modern houses of bricks tiles and wood have been built.In the area of Broomfield and Latchwod Gdns.the houses are mainly 20th century.There are bungalows,terraced houses and maisonettes.In Balmoral Rd. two houses have sash windows, the only ones seen.Gardens are sizeable.Most houses on this estate are council houses.
